measured_by: entropy drop of the response distribution
justification: "…we analysed the entropy drop of the set of responses… If participants select the higher-rewarding shape more often, the variability of the set of responses will decrease thus lowering its entropy."

measured_by: proportion of optimal responses (choice of the higher-rewarding alternative)
justification: "…we additionally analysed the choice of the optimal response… which will confirm whether the entropy drop we observe is indeed driven by the maximisation of the number of correct predictions."
